Join

Join HEART

HEART welcomes students from all disciplines who are passionate about health equity, social justice, and community service. Get involved through volunteering, outreach, education, and advocacy.

Apply now Learn about HEART

What you can do

Volunteer & outreach

Support community partners and help reduce barriers to care through outreach initiatives.

Education & resources

Help create and share evidence-based resources that are accessible and inclusive.

Advocacy & campaigns

Contribute to awareness campaigns that highlight inequities and promote change.

Fill out the form below to join. If the embed doesn’t load, open the form in a new tab.

Questions?

Email us at heartyorku@gmail.com or message us on Instagram @heart_yorku.

HEART

Health Equity Advocacy Response Team — a York University student-led group advancing health equity through advocacy, education, outreach, and community action.

This is a student-led website and is not an official York University website.
